column1: Table 1.2a: Annual hours when PM10 pollution was moderate or higher, for roadside sites, 1997 to 2018
1. Annual hours from individual monitoring sites are included if at least 75% data capture is achieved for the year concerned.
2. The annual mean for 'All Sites' in a given year is the mean hours of all sites included in the table for that year.
3. The categories relate to those defined by the Daily Air Quality Index.
